snippet: LifeProof, which claims to make the thinnest waterproof iPhone case made, has made a waterproof iPad case without a plastic membrane to cover the screen. But it is a struggle to get the case on.
abstract: LifeProof, which claims to make the thinnest waterproof iPhone case made, has made a waterproof iPad case without a plastic membrane to cover the screen. But it is a struggle to get the case on.

headline.main: Another Way to Take Your iPad Underwater
headline.print_headline: A Raincoat for the iPad, to Thwart Water Hazards
